page.title: 04TRANSPORT PATERNS.
page.content:
There are 4 major roads in our area. On 1/7/85 traffic surveys were carried out at 5 points roughly situated at the corners and centre of our block. Namely, Derby road bridge (DRB), Brook House farm roundabout(BHR), Bold Heath bridge(BH), Warrington road (WR) and Clock face road (CFR). The results are summarized as follows:
{ DRB BHR BH WR CFR {CARS :492:210:180:250:165: {VANS :40 :59 :0 :45 :0 : {LORRIES :24 :48 :68 :27 :61 : {BICYCLES :9 :8 :0 :4 :0 : {MOTORBIKES :8 :12 :5 :9 :2 : {COACHES :7 :4 :3 :2 :0 : {PEDESTRIANS :0 :0 :0 :0 :0 : These roads are of the high speed /dual carriageway type. The results show that the area is primarily used as a through route to nearby towns.
